global.cfg.file.stats.table.name: file_stats
global.cfg.rejected.table.name: rejecteddata
global.cfg.dedup.table.name: dupdata
global.cfg.transdate.query.template: select distinct fsys_event_date from flare_8.filetransdatemsgbydate where fsys_msgtype='${msgtype}' and file_date >= ${stDt} and file_date <= ${edDt}
global.cfg.delete.query.template: delete from ${validationSchema}.${validationTable} where msgtype = '${feedName}' and file_date >= ${stDt} and file_date <= ${edDt}
